title: Global energy commodity price index 2013 to 2030
yAxis: Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2030 to 2020.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2013.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2020 to 2018.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
gold: This statistic shows a commodity price index of energy from 2013 through 2018 , and gives projections for 2030 . In 2018 , the index stood at around 87 real US dollars . Real 2010 US dollars reflect buying power in 2010 .
